decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with Birthing Ritual and efficiently playing threats like Shardless Agent and Ice-Fang Coatl. It also has disruptive elements like Subtlety and Endurance to control the board. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggression and disruption, using cards like Sink into Stupor and Flare of Denial to maintain tempo. The inclusion of mana-fixing lands like Misty Rainforest and utility lands like Boseiju, Who Endures adds versatility to the deck's game plan. Overall, the deck seeks to win through aggression and resource denial.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game using counterspells, removal spells, and powerful creatures to outvalue the opponent. By utilizing cards like Solitude and Omnath, Locus of Creation, the deck aims to maintain board control and generate card advantage. Cards such as Teferi, Time Raveler and Galvanic Discharge allow for disruption and tempo advantage. The deck also includes powerful recursion elements with Eternal Witness and Wrenn and Six. Overall, the goal is to outlast the opponent while steadily building towards a winning position.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells. By utilizing a mix of red, white, and green cards, the deck aims to quickly build a board presence and deal damage efficiently. The key strategy involves using cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Scion of Draco to apply pressure while also controlling the board with Leyline Binding and Lightning Bolt. Overall, the deck focuses on speed and versatility to outpace the opponent and secure a victory in Modern 1 vs 1 matches.

This deck focuses on aggressive creature plays combined with disruptive spell effects to control the opponent's board and game plan. It utilizes a combination of efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and powerful spells like Consign to Memory to apply pressure while disrupting the opponent's strategies. Teferi, Time Raveler and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide additional disruption and control elements, allowing the deck to dictate the tempo of the game. By combining aggro strategies with disruptive elements, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory.

This combo deck focuses on using creatures like Samwise Gamgee, Boromir, and Grist to create a powerful toolbox of options. The key is to sacrifice creatures like Cauldron Familiar and Young Wolf to cards like Carrion Feeder and Viscera Seer to fuel Birthing Ritual and Chord of Calling for more powerful creatures like Endurance and Yawgmoth. The deck utilizes efficient mana ramp and creature recursion to overwhelm opponents with a variety of threats and control options, while also having a strong creature-based combo finish.

This Modern Aggro - Death and Taxes deck focuses on disruption and tempo plays to control the board while utilizing efficient creatures and removal spells to chip away at the opponent's life total. The deck utilizes a mix of powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phage, Titan of Fire's Fury, along with disruptive cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Consign to Memory to disrupt the opponent's game plan. With a mix of removal spells like Prismatic Ending and Lightning Bolt, the deck aims to pressure the opponent while disrupting their key plays.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly assemble and utilize a powerful combo involving cards like Goblin Charbelcher and Lotus Bloom, while also utilizing disruptive elements like Force of Negation and Disrupting Shoal to protect the combo. The strategy is based on quickly generating mana and leveraging cards like Sea Gate Restoration and Jwari Disruption to draw into key pieces. The deck aims to win the game through a quick and efficient combo play, without relying on traditional land-based strategies.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively play creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler while utilizing spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart to control the board and disrupt your opponent's strategy. Mishra's Bauble and Scry effects from cards like Expressive Iteration help to maintain card advantage and tempo, while the land base provides consistent mana fixing and access to crucial colors. The overall goal is to apply continuous pressure on your opponent and close out the game quickly with efficient threats and burn spells.

This deck focuses on quickly putting pressure on the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu. It looks to control the board with Leyline Binding and Leyline of the Guildpact, while using burn spells like Lightning Bolt to finish off the opponent. The inclusion of Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Scion of Draco provide powerful late-game threats. The deck also includes some card draw with Nulldrifter and Consign to Memory to maintain momentum and overwhelm the opponent.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Birthing Ritual card to quickly ramp up mana and play powerful creatures and spells ahead of the opponent. It also includes disruptive elements like Force of Negation and Flare of Denial to control the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures like Shardless Agent and Ice-Fang Coatl, as well as disruptive spells like Sink into Stupor. The inclusion of Subtlety and Endurance helps to further disrupt the opponent's strategies, ensuring victory through tempo advantage and board control.

This aggressive Affinity deck in Modern focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with a combination of cheap artifacts and efficient threats. The deck aims to deploy multiple creatures quickly, utilize powerful artifacts like Cranial Plating and Shadowspear to boost their damage output, and disrupt opponents with cards like Tormod's Crypt and Pithing Needle. The land suite includes key cards like Urza's Saga and Spirebluff Canal to support the artifact-heavy strategy. Overall, the deck's key concept revolves around leveraging synergy between artifacts and creatures to apply early pressure and maintain tempo.

This deck focuses on utilizing creatures with powerful enter the battlefield abilities, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Teferi, Time Raveler. By blinking creatures like Flickerwisp and Solitude with Ephemerate, the deck can control the board and generate value. Additionally, the deck includes some graveyard recursion with Boggart Trawler and utilises efficient removal spells like Fatal Push. The goal is to pressure the opponent while disrupting their strategy, ultimately leading to victory through efficient creature plays and disruption.

This deck focuses on aggressive creature play combined with disruptive spells to control the opponent's board. Teferi, Time Raveler provides tempo advantage while Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer put pressure on the opponent. Quantum Riddler helps to filter draws and Solitude offers removal. The deck also includes various lands to support its color requirements. Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury acts as a finisher, with additional spells like Prismatic Ending, Fable of the Mirror-Breaker, Lightning Bolt, and Ephemerate providing additional utility and disruption to secure victories.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by disrupting the opponent's strategy through counterspells, removal, and locking down their options with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Narset, Parter of Veils. The deck also aims to maintain card advantage and control the board state with cards like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Solitude. The inclusion of the companion Kaheera, the Orphanguard adds an additional creature to the deck and provides flexibility in combat situations. Overall, the key concept is to outlast and outmaneuver the opponent through careful planning and strategic plays.

This deck focuses on quick, aggressive plays to overwhelm the opponent and deal damage at a rapid pace. By utilizing low-cost spells and creatures, such as Monastery Swiftspear and Lightning Bolt, it aims to control the board and steadily chip away at the opponent's life total. The inclusion of cards like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Slickshot Show-Off allows for efficient card draw and manipulation, ensuring a steady stream of threats. With a mix of burn spells, creatures, and card manipulation, this deck aims to maintain pressure and quickly close out games before the opponent can stabilize.

The main concept of this Aggro - Affinity deck is to quickly establish a board presence with low-cost artifacts and put pressure on the opponent with efficient creatures. The deck utilizes cards like Mox Opal and Springleaf Drum to generate mana quickly, while also using cards like Memnite and Ornithopter to flood the board. In addition, the deck includes disruptive elements like Engineered Explosives and Pithing Needle to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of speed and disruption.
